title: upgrade-to-quarkus3 - build.gradle.kts support

labels.name: area/jbang
labels.description: Issues related to when using jbang.dev with Quarkus

body:
### Describe the bug

`jbang --fresh upgrade-to-quarkus3@quarkusio`  does not support Gradle with Kotlin DSL:

```
> jbang --fresh upgrade-to-quarkus3@quarkusio 
[jbang] Resolving dependencies...
[jbang]    org.slf4j:slf4j-simple:1.7.36
[jbang] Dependencies resolved
[jbang] Building jar...
This script will attempt to upgrade your Quarkus project to be compatible with Quarkus 3.

It will change files on disk - make sure to have all files committed or some other kind of backup before running it.

Waiting 3 seconds before starting...

3
2
1
Could not find pom.xml nor build.gradle file in current directory.
```
